text: Hospital - based studies in children < 5 years of age from developing countries published over the last 20 years have identified viruses ( excluding measles ) in 8 . 4 % [ 25 ] to 45 % [ 26 ] of LRTI episodes . One of the larger studies , which included nearly 1 , 500 Pakistani children < 5 years of age , detected a virus ( including adenovirus ) in 37 % of cases using viral culture and immunofluorescence ( IF ) [ 27 ] . Previous community - based studies with longitudi - nal follow - up of children have identified viruses in 11 % to 45 % of LRTI cases [ 1 , 28 , 29 ] .
